eng: A New Era, A New Ruler.
A Xiliang colonel has joined your faction.
zh-cn: 一名西凉校尉加入您的派系。
zh-tw: 一名西涼校尉加入您的勢力。

eng: A blade that is a beauty to behold. Inlaid with gold and embellished with shark skin, this blade is fit for a royal family.
zh-cn: 一柄精美绝伦的宝剑，错以黄金，饰以鲛皮，与皇室之尊位相称。
zh-tw: 一柄精美絕倫的寶劍。這把飾有鯊皮的鑲金寶劍正好匹配皇室。

eng: A captain and the guards commanding the army instead of the general.
zh-cn: 由校尉和卫官来指挥军队。
zh-tw: 由校尉和衛官來指揮軍隊。

eng: A charge from a squadron of Spear cavalry is a daunting sight for any soldier. But to see the warriors of Yan descend upon them is a new brand of terror altogether.
zh-cn: 对任何一个士兵来说，一队持矛骑兵的冲锋都会令人生畏。但如果杀来的是燕国战士，则是一种全新的恐怖。
zh-tw: 對任何一個士兵來説，一隊持槍騎兵的衝鋒都會令人生畏。但如果殺來的是燕國戰士，則是一種全新的恐怖。

eng: A cowardly conspiracy! There was a failed attempt to assassinate you during the banquet. Unfortunately, the assaliant was slain by the guards before he could be made to reveal the conspirator's identity.
zh-cn: 阴谋！有人于宴会中欲加害于你。事虽未成，但刺客已被护卫弑杀，无法得知是谁在背后主谋。
zh-tw: 陰謀！有人於宴會中欲加害於你。事雖未成，但刺客已被护卫弑杀，無法得知是誰在背後主謀。

eng: A few of your officers have gained additional experience.
zh-cn: 您的一些官员获得额外经验。
zh-tw: 您的一些官員獲得額外經驗。

eng: A group of beggars appears before you. Among them, a girl dressed nicely comes forward and bows. The girl identifies herself as Dong Bai, the last kin of the tyrant Dong Zhuo, and begs you to take her.
zh-cn: 前面来了一群乞丐，其中有一名衣冠楚楚的少女上前行礼。女孩自称董白，是暴君董卓最后的亲人。她求你带她走。
zh-tw: 前面來了一群乞丐，其中有一名衣冠楚楚的少女上前行禮。女孩自稱董白，是暴君董卓最後的親人。她求你帶她走。

eng: A group of unusual men sporting shaved heads disembark from a ship.  They claim to have journeyed from distant lands to spread the teachings of Buddha. Perhaps it will be worth supporting them?
zh-cn: 从船上下来一群剃光头的异人。他们自称从遥远地方来此传播佛道。也许值得支持他们？
zh-tw: 從船上下來一群剃光頭的異人。他們自稱從遙遠地方來此傳播佛道。也許值得支持他們？

eng: A mysterious sword from the West.
A new regime is coming into power.
A place to trade with the natives.
A place where great teachers and passionate students gather.
A regiment of the Northern Army will join your faction.
zh-cn: 一个北军兵团会加入您的派系。
zh-tw: 一個北軍兵團會加入您的勢力。

eng: A shabby warband requests to join your faction. After Lu Bu's defeat, his daughter Lu Ji seems to have been leading the survivors. However, granting them sanctuary may cause their enemies to come after us.
zh-cn: 一只残军请求加入您的派系。吕布战败后，其女吕姬收拢溃卒。然而，接纳他们可能会惹恼吕布之敌。

eng: A shabby warband requests to join your faction. After Yuan Shu's defeat, his generals Zhang Xun, Ji Ling and Yan Xiang to have been leading the survivors. However, granting them sanctuary may cause their enemies to come after us.
zh-cn: 一只残军请求加入您的派系。袁术战败后，其部将张勋，纪灵及阎象收拢溃卒。然而，接纳他们可能会惹恼袁术之敌。
zh-tw: 一隻殘軍請求加入您的勢力。袁術戰敗後，其部將張勳，紀靈及閻象收攏潰卒。然而，接納他們可能會惹惱袁術之敵。

eng: A yellow turban warband has invaded your territory. You must defeat them.
zh-cn: 有黄巾军侵入主公领地，须从速讨敌。
zh-tw: 有黃巾軍侵入主公領地，須從速討敵。

eng: Adaptation is the only way to live.
All economic activities have been hampered by the minting of a new coin. We have no choice but to wait for merchants to adjust to the new standard.
zh-cn: 所有的经济活动都因为新币的铸造而受到阻碍。我们别无选择，只能等待商人们适应新的标准。
zh-tw: 所有的經濟活動都因爲新幣的鑄造而受到阻礙。我們別無選擇，只能等待商人們適應新的標準。

eng: Although he lost one hand, he was one of the few who survived from duel with Lubu.
Amongst the hills of Jingchu, the unwary may find themselves tripped upon a caltrop, and slain by the man who laid it.
zh-cn: 在荆楚的山中，粗心的人可能会被一把蒺藜绊倒，然后被放它的人杀死。
zh-tw: 在荊楚的山中，粗心的人可能會被一把蒺藜絆倒，然後被放它的人殺死。

eng: An illustrious lineage provides many swords, along with men willing to wield them.
zh-cn: 显赫的血统可以使许多剑士愿意效命。
zh-tw: 顯赫的血統可以使許多劍士願意效命。

eng: An imperial ancestral rite is being held...
zh-cn: 正在举行皇家祭祀仪式……
zh-tw: 正在舉行皇家祭祀儀式……

eng: An inevitable rule to stabilize the turmoil.
Anti-Cavalry, High Armour-Piercing Damage, Break Enemy's Shield
zh-cn: 反骑兵，穿甲伤害高，破盾
zh-tw: 反騎兵，穿甲傷害高，破盾

eng: Armed with bow and sword, these disciplined riders enforce the will of their warlord.
zh-cn: 佩戴剑弓，这些纪律严明的骑手执行他们主公的意志。
zh-tw: 佩戴劍弓，這些紀律嚴明的騎手執行他們主公的意志。

eng: Armed with bow and sword, these hardy soldiers enforce the will of their warlord.
zh-cn: 佩戴剑弓，这些硬朗的士兵执行他们主公的意志。

eng: As the enemy spots the blue turbans on the field, they know the hardest fighting is about to begin.
zh-cn: 当敌人在战场上看到蓝色头巾时，他们就知道最艰苦的战斗即将开始。
zh-tw: 當敵人在戰場上看到藍色頭巾時，他們就知道最艱苦的戰鬥即將開始。

eng: Average Hit Rate, Average Armour-Piercing Damage
zh-cn: 命中率一般，穿甲伤害一般
zh-tw: 命中率一般，穿甲傷害一般

eng: Average Hit Rate, High Armour-Piercing Damage

Wearing bad equipment, the most valuable thing they offer to their commanders is their lives; to sell dearly as better men win the battle for them.
Brandishing their Ji expertly, these men will uphold the fearsome reputation of the Xiliang army.
zh-cn: 这些人熟练地挥舞着战戟，他们会维护西凉军可怕的声誉。

eng: Bravery drives a warrior to battle more effectively than any general; a great axe keeps them there.
zh-cn: 勇气是最好的将领，能带领士兵踏上沙场。良斧在手，则能让士兵在沙场存活。
zh-tw: 勇氣是最好的將領，能帶領士兵踏上沙場。良斧在手，則能讓士兵在沙場存活。

eng: By the time the victim is aware of what has happened, it is already too late.
zh-cn: 等到敌人发现之时就已为时已晚。
zh-tw: 等到敵人發現之時就已爲時已晚。

eng: Cement your rule with legitimacy! Build an Imperial City that will be the envy of other warlords. All under heaven will look to you for leadership.
zh-cn: 要称霸就要有正统的名义。若能建造一座万人敬仰的都城，便可彰显实力，天下人必当归顺。
zh-tw: 要稱霸就要有正統的名義。若能建造一座萬人敬仰的皇城，便可彰顯實力，天下人必當歸順。

eng: Certain polearms, such as the Ji, can parry incoming attacks.
zh-cn: 像戟这样的长柄武器可以阻挡对方的攻击。
zh-tw: 像戟這樣的長柄武器可以阻擋對方的攻擊。

eng: Colonel of the Xiliang Army can be earned when occupied
zh-cn: 占据时可获得西凉军校尉
zh-tw: 占據時可獲得西涼軍校尉

eng: Complete missions to bolster your faction!
zh-cn: 完成任务可以增强您的势力！
zh-tw: 完成任務可以增强您的勢力！

eng: Completing these missions will gather northern colonels to your cause.
zh-cn: 完成这些任务，北军校尉就会为您效力。
zh-tw: 完成這些任務，北軍校尉就會爲您效力。

eng: Covers ally troops to retreat safely.
Danyang troop tally can be earned when occupied
zh-cn: 占据时可获得丹阳虎符
zh-tw: 占據時可獲得丹陽虎符

eng: Diao Chan's beauty is enough to destroy a country in a moment.
Each character in Sun Ce's faction grants him shared expertise points once they reach rank 5. At ranks 9, 12 and 15 they generate one extra point respectively.
zh-cn: 孙策派系中每位人物在达到5级后均会与他分享专长点。在9级、12级和15级时他们分别会产生一个额外的点数。

eng: Echoing the glory of Chu, the great axes these men wield will make short work of their shielded foes.
zh-cn: 这些人所挥的大斧是楚国的荣耀，即使是持盾的敌人亦命不久矣。
zh-tw: 這些人所揮的大斧是楚國的榮耀，即使是持盾的敵人亦命不久矣。

eng: Echoing the nomads they fought for years, these horse archers will do the Xiliang army proud on any battlefield.
zh-cn: 这些马弓手与其他游牧部落征战多年，在任何战场上都是西凉军的骄傲。
zh-tw: 這些馬弓手與其他遊牧部落征戰多年，在任何戰場上都是西涼軍的驕傲。

eng: Economic and social upheaval casued by the minting of a new coin.
zh-cn: 铸造新币引起了经济和社会的动荡。
zh-tw: 鑄造新幣引起了經濟和社會的動蕩。

eng: Even in the elite Xiliang army, having a big sword can only bring advantages to a commander.
zh-cn: 就算在精锐的西凉军里，一把大刀对于将领来说也颇有好处。
zh-tw: 就算在精銳的西涼軍裏，一把大刀對於將領來説也頗有好處。

eng: Every spring, characters gain additional experience.
zh-cn: 每年春季，角色会获得额外经验。
zh-tw: 每年春季，角色會獲得額外經驗。

eng: Ferghana horses are bred to equip cavalry forces.
zh-cn: 养育大宛马来装备骑兵部队。
zh-tw: 養育大宛馬來裝備騎兵部隊。

eng: Following your recent success, the captain of the Northern Army has come to pledge his devotion to you. He brings with him the might of the professional soldiers he commands.
zh-cn: 随着您近期的丰功伟业，督掌北军的中尉前来宣誓效忠于您，他所指挥的整支精良军队也一同前来，加入您的麾下。
zh-tw: 鑒於您近期勢如破竹，北軍中候已宣誓效忠於您。他所指揮的精良軍隊也隨同前來，加入您麾下。

eng: For farmers, they are higher than the emperor.
zh-cn: 对佃户来说，他们的地位比皇帝还高。
zh-tw: 對佃戶來説，他們的地位比皇帝還高。

zh-cn: 坚韧度 / 战利品宝库

eng: Fortunately, nothing of note happened during the banquet.
zh-cn: 幸运的是，宴会中没发生什么大事。
zh-tw: 幸運的是，宴會中沒發生什麼大事。

zh-cn: 获得军事增益，但也会恶化与其他势力的关系。
zh-tw: 獲得軍事增益，但也會惡化與其他勢力的關係。

eng: Garrisoned armies will support the administration of the local county.
zh-cn: 驻防军队将会支持当地郡县的管理。
zh-tw: 駐軍會協助縣內行政事宜。

eng: Hailing from Taishan, these women have coated their arrow points in a special ointment, made from poisonous herbs native to the region. In battle, A volley from these archers will soon leave the enemy gasping for air as the poison very quickly spreads through their veins. A wise commander will use these soldiers to spread terror through the enemy ranks, yet keep them well-protected: they are vulnerable to cavalry, as their range is limited.
Hardened Xiliang soldies, these elite spearmen will hold the line against all comers.
zh-cn: 这些精锐矛兵是百经锤炼的西凉战士，会坚守阵地对抗所有来敌。

eng: Having defended their home for long enough, even militia may grow to rival professional soldiers.
zh-cn: 长久保卫家园之后，即使是民兵也可能成长为职业士兵的对手。
zh-tw: 長久保衛家園之後，即使是民兵也可能成長為職業士兵的對手。

eng: Having fled from their homes, these craftsmen and artisans turn their skills to the defence of their new home and master. \\n\\n Having been selected as the brightest from the many refugees flooding his lands, these engineers serve Tao Qian to the best of their ability. Wielding crossbows, they provide support from afar and will deploy smoke bombs and caltrops when an enemy strays too close. However, these men are not proper soldiers and should not be relied upon to hold the line in melee.
He was also a bandit once.
Heavily-armoured troops carrying iron bows that requires very strong tension.
zh-cn: 重装部队，携带张力很强的铁弓。

zh-cn: 她的优雅、决心和美貌使她受到当时所有英雄的垂涎。

zh-cn: 在腥风血雨中你仍有所依靠。
zh-tw: 在腥風血雨中你仍有所依靠。

zh-cn: 的确，西域商人带来的货物种类繁多，其中不乏珍惜名贵之物。而且，护送他们的佣兵看起来就像是天生的战士。

It will be different this time. Obviously...

zh-tw: 占據時可獲得荊楚虎符

zh-cn: 刘夫人总是关心她的家人。
zh-tw: 劉夫人總是關心他的家人。

eng: Mighty, gnarled monoliths, the imposing peaks of China's south stand like sentinels against the unrelenting waters beyond. Amongst these hills and peaks, the Yue tribes eke out their continued existence; brought low from the once-proud past, they stand now against the threat of Han invasion from the north. Although they wield sword and shield, they are nothing like the professional warriors coming to face them. \\n\\n Yet, united behind one who purports to fight for their ideals, the Yue are able to summon themselves into something resembling their own strength – their legacy demands it!

Move swift as the Wind and closely-formed as the Wood. Attack like the Fire and be still as the Mountain. \\n\\n These elite soldiers hail from Danyang province and are rapidly gaining renown with commanders in the crumbling Han empire. Armed with a glaive and heavy armor, they have gathered a reputation assaulting enemy strongpoints succesfully and routing their defenders. \\n\\n Already, enemies have learned to fear their expertise, as well as the gunpowder bombs they carry with them. When the Blue Turbans have been spotted on the field, the foe knows their days are numbered.
Mud makes the movement and combat of all units inefficient.
No horseman shall pass these spearmen from the famed Xiliang army.
zh-cn: 没有任何骑兵能冲破赫赫有名的西凉军枪阵。
zh-tw: 沒有任何騎兵能衝破赫赫有名的西涼軍槍陣。

eng: No one welcomes them, and everyone cast doubt to your decision.
Not all of us get a second chance.
zh-cn: 不是所有人都有机会重来。
zh-tw: 不是所有人都有機會重來。

eng: Once a governor faction leader has earned enough prestige to be named king, the three strongest warlords will proclaim themselves emperor, which will make their capitals seats of great power.\\n\\n[[b]]Victory Condition[[/b]]\\nUnite China by bringing all emperor seats under your control.\\n\\n[[b]]Victory Types[[/b]]\\nStandard: become emperor and eliminate all other emperors by taking their seats of power.\\n\\nCo-operative: combine your strength by signing a shared mandate diplomatic deal.\\n\\nHead-to-Head: destroy the other player, or compete with one another to be the first to meet the victory conditions.
zh-cn: 一旦某个朝廷派系有了足够的声望成王，那么最强的三家诸侯就会自行称帝，他们的都城就会成为皇位的所在。\\n\\n[[b]]胜利条件[[/b]]\\n控制所有的皇位，从而统一中国。\\n\\n[[b]]胜利类型[[/b]]\\n标准：成为皇帝并通过夺取皇位消灭其他的所有皇帝\\n\\n合作：签署共承天命协定\\n\\n对抗：消灭其他的玩家，或第一个达到胜利条件
zh-tw: 一旦有一支太守勢力的領袖獲得足以稱王的威望，群雄中最強的三家便會稱帝，使其都城成為握有龐大權力的皇城。\\n\\n[[b]]勝利條件[[/b]]\\n奪佔所有皇城，即能一統天下。\\n\\n[[b]]勝利類型：[[/b]]\\n標準：稱帝，並透過奪取其他稱帝者的皇城，消滅其他所有稱帝者。\\n\\n合作：可以簽訂同享天命的外交條約來集結力量。\\n\\n對決戰役：消滅對方玩家，或是與其他玩家角逐，成為第一位達成勝利條件的玩家。

eng: Once a governor faction leader has earned enough prestige to be named king, the three strongest warlords will proclaim themselves emperor, which will make their capitals seats of great power.\\n\\n[[b]]Victory condition[[/b]]: Unite China by bringing all emperor seats under your control and by owning {{tr:victory_condition_regions_count}} {{tr:map_regions}}.
zh-cn: 一旦某个朝廷派系有了足够的声望成王，那么最强的三家诸侯就会自行称帝，他们的都城就会成为皇位的所在。\\n\\n[[b]]胜利条件[[/b]]：控制所有的皇位并拥有{{tr:victory_condition_regions_count}}个{{tr:map_regions}}，从而统一天下。
zh-tw: 一旦有一支太守勢力的領袖獲得足以稱王的威望，群雄中最強的三家便會稱帝，使其都城成為握有龐大權力的皇城。太守勢力無法自行稱帝，但可以透過佔領這些皇城來證明自己的影響力，進而登基為帝。\\n\\n[[b]]勝利條件[[/b]]：奪佔所有皇城並擁有{{tr:victory_condition_regions_count}}個{{tr:map_regions}}，即能一統天下。

eng: Once again the flames begin to burn. Now we are ready to destroy the Han dynasty. Our forces are strong, and the old comrades who had to live in hiding will also appear and respond to us. Let's make sure that Zhang Jue's unfulfilled dream come true.
Once equipped, this follower can't be unequipped until it is destroyed in 10 turns!
zh-cn: 装备此随从后，须等到10回合后才能解除。之后此随从即会消失。
zh-tw: 裝備此隨從後，須等到10回合後才能解除。之後此隨從即會消失。

eng: Once equipped, this item can't be unequipped
zh-cn: 此饰物一旦装备便无法解除
zh-tw: 此飾物一旦裝備便無法解除

eng: Once equipped, this item can't be unequipped until it is destroyed in 20 turns!
zh-cn: 装备此饰物后，须等到20回合后才能解除。之后此饰物即会消失。
zh-tw: 裝備此飾物後，須等到20回合後才能解除。之後此飾物即會消失。

eng: Perhaps out of admiration or to curry favour, a faction has put in a good word for you with the emperor. Talk of your exploits is is all that is on everyone's lips at the palace of late.
zh-cn: 也许是出于钦佩，也许是向您示好，有一派系在皇帝面前为你多加褒词。最近在宫中人人都在谈论您的功绩。
zh-tw: 也許是出於欽佩，也許是向您示好，有一勢力在皇帝面前爲你多加褒詞。最近在宮中人人都在談論您的功績。

eng: Perhaps you can bring them into your fold...
Pike Wall - Ji Guards of the Eight Talents
Powerful white tigers are with us.
zh-cn: 强大的白虎与我们同在。
zh-tw: 强大的白虎與我們同在。

zh-cn: 提供[[b]]丹阳部队校尉[[/b]]招募次数
zh-tw: 提供[[b]]丹陽部隊校尉[[/b]]招募次數

eng: Raining death from afar, the archers of Jingchu have learned well the advantage that the bow brings in hilly terrain.
zh-cn: 荆楚弓手早已领悟到了弓箭在丘陵地带的优势。
zh-tw: 荊楚弓手早已領悟到了弓箭在丘陵地帶的優勢。

eng: Ready to colour the world once again.
Rebellion of Li Jue and Guo Si

Recruited by Liu Bei during his time as "General of the Left", these soldiers now are loyal to their general and will fight to see his vision fulfilled. The Han shall be restored, and they will unleash a barrage of arrows upon any rebel who would see the Han extinguished. And And if their foes would close the distance, they shall find that they are equally skilled in melee combat, unless they fight cavalry.
Ride, ride to ruin and the world's ending!
zh-cn: 冲啊！冲啊！为了捍卫天下！勇往直前！
zh-tw: 冲啊！ 冲啊！ 为了捍卫天下！勇往直前！

eng: Selecting this will open the Imperial Intrigue panel, which governs all the mechanics which become active once Emperor Xian comes of age in 195 CE, introducing a struggle over the influence of the new imperial power.
zh-cn: 选择此项将打开朝廷权谋面板，该面板统管着公元195年献帝加元服后开启的所有机制，代表着皇权所面临的政治角力。
zh-tw: 選取之後將會打開朝廷權謀面板，統管獻帝於公元195年成年後開放使用的所有機制，代表著新任皇權所面臨的政治角力。

eng: Shoot some crossbow-bombs for reducing morale of hostile units.
zh-cn: 射出一些弩弹，用于降低敌军士气。
zh-tw: 射出一些弩彈，用於降低敵軍士氣。

eng: Short Range, High Armour-Piercing Damage, Average Reload
zh-cn: 近距，穿甲伤害高，射击速率一般
zh-tw: 近距，穿甲傷害高，射擊速率一般

eng: Short Range, Low Armour-Piercing Damage, Fast Reload
zh-cn: 近距，穿甲伤害低，射击速率快
zh-tw: 近距，穿甲傷害低，射擊速率快

eng: Short Range, Low Armour-Piercing Damage, Supress, Slow Reload
zh-cn: 近距，穿甲伤害低，压制，射击速率慢
zh-tw: 近距，穿甲傷害低，壓制，射擊速率慢

eng: Short Range, Powerful Flame Damage, Average Reload
zh-cn: 近距，火焰伤害强，射击速率一般
zh-tw: 近距，火焰傷害強，射擊速率一般

eng: Slander! A rival warlord is spreading malicious rumours at the imperial court, causing Emperor Xian to doubt our loyalty to the Han.
zh-cn: 诽谤！一个敌对的军阀在朝廷散布恶意的谣言，使献帝怀疑我们对大汉的忠诚。
zh-tw: 誹謗！一個敵對的軍閥在朝廷散佈惡意的謠言，使獻帝懷疑我們對大漢的忠誠。

eng: Sogdians from the west has been spotted entering our borders. We will be able to purchase fine goods or hire Sogd mercenaries soon.
zh-cn: 自西域而来的粟特商人出现在我方境内。我们很快就能买到精美商品，或者雇佣粟特佣兵。
zh-tw: 自西域而來的粟特商人出現在我方境内。我們很快就能買到精美商品，或者雇傭粟特傭兵。

eng: Speed is the essence of war.
Stalwart as the hills they were raised in, these Chu spearmen are an asset to any warlord.
zh-cn: 这些楚国的矛兵与山丘一样坚韧，对任何一个军阀来说都是一笔财富。
zh-tw: 這些楚國的矛兵與山丘一樣堅韌，對任何一個軍閥來說都是一筆財富。

eng: Steppe horse archers are in high demand by many warlords. But sometimes they make a better profit by working for themselves.
zh-cn: 很多军阀都想要有草原骑射手。但与其为人效命，有时候不如自己单干。
zh-tw: 很多軍閥都想要有草原騎射手。但與其為人效命，有時候不如自己單幹。

eng: Sun Tzu said that one should always give an enemy room to escape, so that they do not fight with the fervour of the doomed. Yet for Gao Shun's elite force, Xian Chen Ying, being entirely surrounded is nothing but another dimension to slaughter. \\n\\n Renowned for their abilitiy to smash through enemy formations, Xian Chen Ying excel even when surrounded. The bodies will pile high, but Xian Chen Ying will still emerge from the pile victorious.
Take out their archers. I'll meet you in the middle.
zh-cn: 解决掉他们的弓手，我们到中间会合。
zh-tw: 解決掉他們的弓手，我們到中間會合。

eng: Thanks to your patronage of scholars and men of talent, your officers have made progress on the path to enlightenment.
zh-cn: 由于您对学者和人才的赞助，您的官员在启蒙的道路上取得了进步。
zh-tw: 由於您對學者和人才的贊助，您的官員在啓蒙的道路上取得了進步。

eng: The Black Mountain bandits are scattered.
The Black Mountain bandits make their advance.
The Black Mountain bandits make their move.
The Black Mountain bandits make their stand.
The Black Mountain bandits unleash their fury.
The Glory of the Han shall endure while these men have the strength to wield their halberds.
zh-cn: 只要这些人有力量挥舞他们的战戟，汉室的荣耀就将延续。
zh-tw: 只要這些人有力量揮舞他們的戰戟，漢室的榮耀就將延續。

eng: The Han must be restored. These men shall follow their righteous general to the death to see it done.
zh-cn: 汉室必须复兴。这些人将誓死跟随他们通晓大义的将军。
zh-tw: 漢室必須復興。這些人將誓死跟隨他們通曉大義的將軍。

eng: The Last Kin of the Dong Zhuo
The Xiliang Army is yours to command! Each colonel is loyal to whom they have been assigned, vowing never to leave their side!
zh-cn: 西凉军为您效命！每一位校尉都忠于自己所属之人，誓死不离其侧！
zh-tw: 西涼軍爲您效命！每一位校尉都忠於自己所屬之人，誓死不離其側！

eng: The Yan frontier offers no shortage of good horses. The constant warfare provides these steeds with expert riders.
zh-cn: 燕疆不乏良马。连绵的战事为这些战马提供了老练的骑手。
zh-tw: 燕疆不乏良馬。連綿的戰事為這些戰馬提供了老練的騎手。

eng: The Yellow Turban is ready to color the world once again.

The Yellow Turban rebellion challenges the corruption that poisons China and has made many question old loyalties. \\n\\n These noblemen have renounced their former warlords to seek justice and redemption. Their previous life of privilege has trained and equipped them well, and they ride into battle clad in ornate armour and helmets upon impressive mounts of the finest stock. \\n\\n With sharp spears, the impact of their charge is merely a way to break the enemy’s lines for deadly close combat.
zh-cn: 黄巾军冲击了天下的腐朽势力，许多人都开始有所动摇。\\n\\n这些贵族不再效忠于之前的诸侯，而是另寻天义以求救赎。他们之前生活优渥，自然装备训练充足，他们身着华丽兜鍪骑良马杀入战场，他们手持锋利的长枪，冲破敌阵后也会近战砍杀。
zh-tw: 黃巾軍起義，劍指危害天下的腐敗，並讓許多人對心中舊有的忠誠觀念產生疑問。 \\n\\n 這些名門賢士拋棄了原先效忠的諸侯，轉而尋求公義，彌補自己的罪過。他們因先前的優渥生活而受過紮實的訓練，並擁有精良的裝備。賢士穿戴華美的護甲與頭盔，騎著威風凜凜的良駒駿馬踏上戰場。 \\n\\n 他們手持鋒利的長槍向前衝鋒，只為突破陣線，與敵軍來場你死我活的近戰廝殺。

eng: The Yuan clan's fame brings many benefits, one of which the number of men willing to lay down their lives in their service. \\n\\n Wielding the noble Jian blade, and protected by stout shields and good armour, these swordsmen will defend their masters with zeal. They form the frontline of the Yuan battleline, chopping and slashing at their foe until either they or themselves are slain.

The bandit queen's forces are bolstered by the presence of these so-called "phantoms". Hailing from Taishan, these warriors have already gathered an ominous reputation for the poison bombs they carry with them. If the wind is right, these bombs will cause entire regiments to choke without even comitting to battle. They are furthermore armed with a light sword and cloth armor, so they should not be relied on to hold the line in melee.
The captain of the centre, inspector of the professional Northern Army, has pledged his allegiance to Dong Zhuo. He now has a formidable force at his disposal.
zh-cn: 领军的校尉掌管北军世兵，现已效忠于董卓。这是支不可小觑的部队。
zh-tw: 領軍的校尉掌管北軍世兵，現已效忠于董卓。這是支不可小觑的部隊。

eng: The captain of the centre, inspector of the professional Northern Army, has pledged his allegiance to Gongsun Zan. He now has a formidable force at his disposal.
zh-cn: 领军的校尉掌管北军世兵，现已效忠于公孙瓒。这是支不可小觑的部队。
zh-tw: 領軍的校尉掌管北軍世兵，現已效忠于公孫瓚。這是支不可小觑的部隊。

eng: The captain of the centre, inspector of the professional Northern Army, has pledged his allegiance to Yuan Shu. He now has a formidable force at his disposal.
zh-cn: 领军的校尉掌管北军世兵，现已效忠于袁术。这是支不可小觑的部队。
zh-tw: 領軍的校尉掌管北軍世兵，現已效忠于袁術。這是支不可小觑的部隊。

eng: The chaos caused by Li Jue and Guo Si is devastating the whole country.
The emperor thinks highly of you. His majesty has decided to gift you a small fortune in honour of your contributions to the state.
zh-cn: 天子对你甚有好感，决定给你一些赏赐，来表彰你对朝廷的贡献。
zh-tw: 天子對你甚有好感，决定給你一些賞賜，來表彰你對朝廷的貢獻。

eng: The estates of powerful and wealthy families.
The fervour is now only left in the white ashes.
The finer your horses, the more powerful your cavalry will be.
The first three warlords to be named king will proclaim themselves emperor.
zh-cn: 最强的三家诸侯会自行称帝。
zh-tw: 群雄中最強的三家會稱帝。

eng: The flame of hope shines bright in the darkest hour.
zh-cn: 希望之火在最黯时刻光芒闪耀。
zh-tw: 希望之火在最黯時刻光芒閃耀。

eng: The house of Dong is destroyed.
The imperial ancestral rite ended without incident. Unfortunately, the emperor returned to the place without acknowledging your contribution.
zh-cn: 皇家祭祀仪式顺利完成，但天子一言不发便回宫了。
zh-tw: 皇家祭祀儀式順利完成，但天子一言不發便回宮了。

eng: The imperial ancestral rite was completed successfully, and the emperor shows favour to the attending nobles.
zh-cn: 皇家祭祀仪式圆满完成，天子对到场的贵族示恩。
zh-tw: 皇家祭祀儀式圓滿完成，天子對到場的貴族示恩。

eng: The markets have been thrown into chaos as townsfolk and merchants scramble to adopt the new currency.
zh-cn: 由于镇民和商人争相采用新货币，市场已陷入混乱。
zh-tw: 由於鎮民和商人正向采用新貨幣，市場已陷入混亂。

eng: The next reform can be implemented without cooldown
zh-cn: 下次改革可以马上执行，无需冷却
zh-tw: 下次改革可以馬上執行，無需冷卻

eng: The nomads of the steppes have a reputation for fine horsemanship. These particular horse archers have turned to banditry and pillaging to fill their coffers. They will allign themselves to bandit chiefs of note, who can afford their services by giving them a proportional share of the loot. In battle, they harass the enemy from afar, using their horses to quickly wheel about when the counter-attack comes.
The officer in charge of Danyang units.
The officer in charge of Sogdian mercenary units.
The officer in charge of White Horse units.
The officer in charge of house Yuan units.
The path to prominence in these turbulent times is by the sword! Win battles to demonstrate your capability.
zh-cn: 在此动荡之秋，要想出人头地就只有靠刀剑！赢得战斗便能展示您的能力。
zh-tw: 在此動蕩之秋，要想出人頭地就只有靠刀劍！贏得戰鬥便能展示您的能力。

eng: The people of Danyang have a reputation for bravery. Tao Qian has turned them into a well-trained army.
zh-cn: 丹阳人以奋勇著称。陶谦整备军队，训练有素。
zh-tw: 丹陽人以奮勇著稱。陶謙整備軍隊，訓練有素。

eng: The pride of the Xiliang army, these armored horsemen will teach their enemy the meaning of “elite cavalry”.
zh-cn: 作为西凉军的骄傲，这些重甲骑兵将教导他们的敌人“精锐骑兵”的含义。
zh-tw: 作爲西涼軍的驕傲，這些重甲騎兵將教導他們的敵人“精銳騎兵”的含義。

eng: The quantity and quality of your warhorses is unmatched!
zh-cn: 战马的数量与质量皆无与伦比！
zh-tw: 戰馬的數量與質量皆無與倫比！

eng: The roar of gunpowder is more terrifying than any man or beast.
zh-cn: 火药的轰鸣声比任何人兽都更可畏。
zh-tw: 火藥的轟鳴聲比任何人獸都更可畏。

eng: The role of these troops can be deduced from their appearance; their armour pieces are mismatched, put together by collecting those left in the aftermath of battle, or sourced from nearby villages. \\n\\n Their most important function is to search and collect loot, weapons and armour after the battle to put towards the Great Peace. They are not good at close combat, so they use a bunch of captured repeating crossbows to support frontline.
zh-cn: 从这些部队的外观就不难推测他们是干什么的，他们的盔甲要么是从战场上拾捡拼凑而来，要么是从周围村落里搞来的。\\n\\n他们最重要的作用是在战后搜集战利品、武器以及盔甲，从而推进太平大业。他们不善于近战，所以只用一些捡来的连弩支援前线部队。
zh-tw: 這群士兵的作用能從外表窺知一二：他們的護甲並非成套，而是收集戰後遺留的部件或附近村莊之物拼湊而成。 \\n\\n 他們最大的用處便是在戰鬥結束後收集戰利品、武器和護甲，以便在成就太平之路上添磚加瓦。他們不善於近戰，所以只用一些撿來的連弩支援前綫部隊。

eng: The typical bandit force consists of lightly armored troops. These men are not a typical bandit force. A string of victories or lucky looting has netted them the excellent armour wielded by the heavy troops of the Han empire. They now form a heavy spear unit, capable of holding their ground against even the dreaded barded horsemen. With these men, any aspiring bandit warlord may find himself a bandit king or queen, one day.
The unit inspires nearby soldiers to fight more aggressively.
zh-cn: 此部队激励附近士卒更粗莽地战斗。
zh-tw: 此單位激勵附近士卒更粗莽地戰鬥。

eng: The unit inspires nearby soldiers to fight more cautiously.
zh-cn: 此部队激励附近士卒更谨慎地战斗。
zh-tw: 此單位激勵附近士卒更謹慎地戰鬥。

eng: The wave of the blade push the enemy away.
zh-cn: 一道道刀浪将敌人推走。
zh-tw: 一道道刀浪將敵人推走。

eng: The yellow turban warband is crushed. Hailing from Qingzhou, the survivors offer their servitude. Cao Cao gathers them under his banner and dubs them Qingzhou Troops.
zh-cn: 黄巾匪徒已被击溃。青州生还者们愿意报德。曹操将之收于旗下，名为青州军。
zh-tw: 黃巾匪徒已被擊潰。青州生還者們願意報德。曹操將之收於旗下，名爲青州軍。

eng: Their bolts remind the foe that even at range, noone is truly safe from the might of the Xiliang army.
zh-cn: 他们的弩矢提醒敌人，即使离得很远，在强大的西凉军前也不会安全。
zh-tw: 他們的弩矢提醒敵人，即使離得很遠，在强大的西涼軍前也不會安全。

eng: Their own lives are not important, and they will somehow stop the enemy.
zh-cn: 不顾己命也要阻挡敌人。
zh-tw: 不顧己命也要阻擋敵人。

eng: Their shots are almost always accurate even in the sand breeze.
zh-cn: 即使在沙尘中，他们也总能准确命中。
zh-tw: 即使在沙塵中，他們也總能準確命中。

eng: There is no sin against this innocent girl.
There is nothing to fear because the heaven is watching.
There's a sufficient number of horses.
There's no shortage of good horses.
These versatile infantry will solve nigh any problem their Wu commanders might face.
zh-cn: 这些多能的步兵几乎可以解决吴军将领可能面临的任何问题。
zh-tw: 這些多能的步兵幾乎可以解决吳軍將領可能面臨的任何問題。

eng: They becomes frenzied when blood is spilled.
zh-cn: 他们闻到血腥就会疯狂。
zh-tw: 他們聞到血腥就會瘋狂。

eng: They excel as warriors having trained in martial disciplines.
zh-cn: 他们是受过武术训练的优秀战士。
zh-tw: 他們是受過武術訓練的優秀戰士。

eng: They get everything down to a note.
This age of strife breeds men with a talent for warfare. A follower who has recently joined the faction can assume the role of managing an exclusive unit.
zh-cn: 乱世出豪杰。新进的一名随从可管理一只特殊军队。
zh-tw: 亂世出豪傑。新進的一名隨從可管理一隻特殊軍隊。

eng: This authorisation tally is tradeable in diplomacy!
zh-cn: 此兵符可在外交中用来交易！
zh-tw: 此兵符可在外交中用來交易！

eng: This general directs and empowers his forces from a… safer distance.
zh-cn: 此将会在…安全距离指挥激励部队。
zh-tw: 這名將軍指揮若定，鼓舞盟友大顯身手…但他本人並不親赴前線。

eng: This hero gets a bonus in duels.
zh-cn: 此英雄在单挑中有加成。
zh-tw: 此英雄在單挑中有加成。

eng: This hero gets a great bonus in duels.
zh-cn: 此英雄在单挑中有强大加成。
zh-tw: 此英雄在單挑中有强大加成。

eng: This unit can attack city gates, allowing you to instantly launch a siege battle without having to wait for towers or battering rams to be built.
This unit has a ranged weapon to light a fire from a distance.
This unit's weapon allows it to pierce even the strongest enemy armour.
zh-cn: 此部队的武器可以穿透最强的护甲。
zh-tw: 此單位的武器可以穿透最强的護甲。

eng: Those who intervene instead of the lord.
zh-cn: 这些人代替主公处理事务。
zh-tw: 這些人代替主公處理事務。

eng: Though you started with little, you will end with much.
zh-cn: 起家微薄亦可立业有成。
zh-tw: 起家微薄亦可立業有成。

eng: Thousands of comrades across China will rise against oppression.
zh-cn: 黄天之下千万教友将纷纷揭竿而起。
zh-tw: 黃天之下千萬教友將紛紛揭竿而起。

eng: Tiger furs provide protection against missile attacks.
Tightly woven and does not fall off easily.

To be the bolt of justice, to spearhead a charge deep into the enemy lines, delivering vengeance for an oppressed people, this is the task of these warriors. \\n\\n These cavalry are one of the few shock cavalry of the Yellow Turbans army.; once they have ploughed into an enemy formation with their spears, they have the armour and the skill to keep fighting, thrusting with enough force to pierce most armour with righteous intensity.
zh-cn: 这些勇士的使命便是替天行道，为苍生而战，给与敌人致命一击。\\n\\n 这些骑兵是黄巾军中仅有的突击骑兵。他们不但能手持长枪，用冲锋撕裂敌人的阵型，还身披重甲，能够在近战中坚持奋战，用正义的怒火刺穿敌人的铠甲。
zh-tw: 替天行道，衝鋒陷陣，為民除害，是彼使命。\\n\\n這些騎兵是黃巾軍中僅有的突擊騎兵。一旦執槍闖入敵陣，便能憑著良甲和武藝持續奮戰，哪怕是頑石般的盔甲也難以抵擋他們灌注義憤的一擊。

eng: Treat your men as you would your own beloved sons. And they will follow you into the deepest valley. \\n\\n Serving the heirs of Sun Tzu, these men would willingly follow them into heirs and certain death. Armed with a light glaive and medium armor, these men can hold their own in a variety of situations, facing down cavalry or infantry with equal skill. Their versatility has caused them to be fondly called “problem solvers” by their commanders and are given great respect, which they repay with loyalty.
Tribal hunters can provide us with additional food.
zh-cn: 部落猎人可为我们提供额外的食物。
zh-tw: 部落獵人可爲我們提供額外的食物。

eng: Unlocked in 195 CE. Once this is unlocked, you can use imperial favour to preform [[b]]imperial decrees[[/b]]
zh-cn: 在公元195年解锁。解锁后，可以使用天子宠信来颁布[[b]]圣旨[[/b]]。
zh-tw: 於公元195年解鎖。一旦解除此鎖定，您便可以運用皇帝寵信度發佈[[b]]皇帝詔書[[/b]]

eng: Unlocked when Emperor Xian comes of age in 195 CE
zh-cn: 公元195年献帝加元服后解锁
zh-tw: 公元195年獻帝成年時解除鎖定

eng: Unlocks a special ability for cavalry units
zh-cn: 解锁骑兵部队一个特殊能力
zh-tw: 解鎖騎兵單位一個特殊能力

eng: Unlocks elite Northern Army Captain Retinues
zh-cn: 解锁精锐北军校尉随从
zh-tw: 解鎖精銳北軍校尉隨從

eng: Unlocks special abilities for black mountain bandit units
zh-cn: 解锁黑山匪徒部队特殊能力
zh-tw: 解鎖黑山匪徒單位特殊能力

zh-cn: 使用多种武器，多重角色
zh-tw: 使用多種武器，多重角色

eng: Very High Hit Rate, Very Low Damage
zh-cn: 命中率非常高，伤害非常低
zh-tw: 命中率非常高，傷害非常低

eng: Very Long Range, High Armour-Piercing Damage, Very Slow Reload
zh-cn: 超远距，穿甲伤害高，射击速率非常慢
zh-tw: 超遠距，穿甲傷害高，射擊速率非常慢

eng: Vigilantes patrol the region and harass enemy armies.
zh-cn: 巡守卫队在此地域巡逻，骚扰敌军。
zh-tw: 巡守衛隊在此地域巡邏，騷擾敵軍。

eng: Wang Yun went to them obediently and left these words.\\n\\n "It was my wish to make the country peaceful. I didn't, so I sacrifice myself. The litte emperor has shown kindness to me, and I can't stand to live a miserable life."
Wars are a costly endeavour and one cannot hope to end this chaos without a sizable treasury. Show all under heaven that you possess China's wealth.
zh-cn: 兴师十万，日费千金。国用不足则不能平乱。掌控举国之财，而后昭示天下。
zh-tw: 興師十萬，日费千金。國用不足則不能平亂。掌控舉國之財，而後昭示天下。

eng: We are reaping the benefits of military rule.
We have gathered warriors from nearby nomadic peoples to form a powerful cavalry unit. These formidable cataphracts will crush your enemies.
zh-cn: 我们从附近游牧民族召集战士，组成了一支强健骑兵。这些令人可畏的铁甲骑兵将冲垮你的敌人。
zh-tw: 我們從附近游牧民族召集戰士，組成了一支强健騎兵。這些令人可畏的鐵甲騎兵將衝垮你的敵人。

eng: We're barely keeping our cavalry supplied.
zh-cn: 勉强能供应我们的骑兵。
zh-tw: 勉强能供應我們的騎兵。

eng: We've run into problems paying the troops with the new coin. We have no choice but to wait for soldiers to adjust to the new standard.
zh-cn: 由于新币发行，分发军饷时出现问题。我们别无选择，只能等到士兵们适应新的标准。
zh-tw: 由於新幣發行，分發軍餉時出現問題。我們別無選擇，只能等到士兵們適應新的標準。

eng: We've run into problems purchasing grain with the new coin. We have no choice but to wait for farmers to adjust to the new standard.
zh-cn: 由于新币发行，买粮时出现问题。我们别无选择，只能等到农民们适应新的标准。
zh-tw: 由於新幣發行，買糧時出現問題。我們別無選擇，只能等到農民們適應新的標準。

eng: What kind of men are these, who are not soldiers, yet wear elite armour? Bloody men, who have earned their weaponry through victory and pillaging.
zh-cn: 这些人并非军士，却穿着精良的铠甲。他们的装备来自于血腥的胜利和洗劫。
zh-tw: 這些人并非軍士，卻穿著精良的鎧甲。他們的裝備來自於血腥的勝利和洗劫。

eng: When they face Xianchenying, they lose confidence.
When unequipped, the upkeep cost of the units unlocked by this follower will increase.
zh-cn: 未装备时，该随从解锁的部队的维护费用会增加。
zh-tw: 未裝備時，該隨從解鎖的單位的維護費用會增加。

eng: When your faction reached Enlightened, there will be Yellow Turban rebellion across China.

Where the militia of the Han are pressed into service out of obligation, the Yellow Turban zealots rise to fight because it is the only way to carve a better future for the people. \\n\\n Their fierce determination makes them more effective than standard militia. They charge into battle, lightly-armoured and equipped with explosive materials, ready to rend asunder any who doubt or question the Way.
zh-cn: 汉代的民兵往往是被迫服役的，但黄巾战士们确实真心实意为天下苍生而战。\\n\\n 这种坚决的意志使他们比一般的民兵更为勇猛。他们身着轻甲，手持炸裂物，毫不留情地斩杀一切与黄天为敌之人。
zh-tw: 漢軍民兵是被迫服役效勞朝廷，黃巾信眾則是為了扶助天下萬民而挺身奮戰。\\n\\n他們堅守職志，比起一般民兵更加善戰。這些信眾執爆裂物著輕甲趕赴沙場，欲將質疑太平道的敵人全數斬除。

eng: Whereas some cavalry bring a primal, instantly shattering force to the battlefield, other mounted warriors are suited to the slower burn, embroiling themselves in the melee and staying to continue inflicting casualties. \\n\\n Whilst they get less power on the charge, their destructive capability increases dramatically once they begin hacking away at foes.
zh-cn: 有的骑兵擅于冲锋，以蛮横的力量来击垮敌人；有的骑兵则相较之下更擅于慢火细炖，故意让自身卷入近战，以持续对敌人造成杀伤。\\n\\n这些近战骑兵虽然冲击力较差，但与敌人接触进入混战后却能造成相当大的杀伤。
zh-tw: 有些騎兵以迅猛破陣之力見長，有些則善於近身纏鬥，持續殺傷敵人。\\n\\n這些掠奪者殺入戰場，儘管衝鋒的威力較一般騎兵略遜一籌，但在接敵後便能大幅發揮摧枯拉朽的能力，將敵兵一一劈裂。

eng: Whether near or from afar, these soldiers shall bring justice to any who would threaten their prince.
zh-cn: 无论远近，这些士卒都要为任何威胁他们主公的人讨回公道。
zh-tw: 無論遠近，這些士卒都要為任何威脅他們主公的人討回公道。

eng: Whilst all Yellow Turban warriors are happy to wade into the heart of battle, the Gallants of the People were made to hold the frontline against enemies - to be anywhere else would be to waste their talent and ardour. \\n\\n They are heavily-armoured, though not as heavily plated as some other warriors, yet with great axe they are able to push back the advancing foe whilst deflecting blows. Where their mail may falter, their fanaticism never will.
zh-cn: 黄巾军志士个个不怕冲锋陷阵，但是护民勇士尤其适合固守阵线，要是挪作他用可就浪费了他们一身的本领和热忱。\\n\\n他们身披重甲，也许不若其他铁甲兵士防御周全，但可仰赖手中大斧抵挡敌军、化解攻势。正所谓甲胄可破，斗志不渝。
zh-tw: 黃巾軍志士個個不怕衝鋒陷陣，但是護民勇士尤其適合固守陣線，要是挪作他用可就浪費了他們一身的本領和熱忱。\\n\\n他們身披重甲，也許不若其他鐵甲兵士防禦周全，但可仰賴手中大斧抵擋敵軍、化解攻勢。正所謂甲冑可破，鬥志不渝。

eng: Win a battle where one of your generals personally kills 300 or more soldiers
zh-cn: 赢得一场您的一名将领亲自杀敌三百人的战斗
zh-tw: 贏得一場您的一名將領親自殺敵三百人的戰鬥

eng: With Hand-ji and shield, these Xiliang warriors will bring death to the enemy.
zh-cn: 佩戴盾与手戟，这些西凉勇士为敌人带来杀身之祸。
zh-tw: 佩戴盾與手戟，這些西涼勇士為敵人帶來殺身之禍。

eng: With sword and shield, these Xiliang horsemen will strike fear into the foe.
zh-cn: 佩戴剑盾，这些西凉骑兵令敌军不寒而栗。
zh-tw: 佩戴劍盾，這些西涼騎兵令敵軍不寒而慄。

eng: With the many wars that ravage China, militias everywhere have sprung up to defend their home and livelihood from bandits, yellow turbans, and invading warlords. Tempered by hard-won experience, these men have become adepts at war by survival.  Equally skilled in melee as with the bow, they over time bought horses to level the playing field with the more professional troops they often face. Many of these veterans now flock to the banners of the warlords, providing a rapid response force fit for a variety of situations.
With these numbers you can accomplish great things.

Xun Yu openly criticized you for seeking power, saying you should be focusing on the restoration of Han dynasty. He even had the gall to say that because of your pursuit of power, you will never see a good end. \\n\\n You were furious, but you could not openly express it, since he was an old friend and a loyal servant.
Xun Yu recognized the meaning of your "gift" and made the last choice. You regretted your choice when you heard that he was dead, but it was too late.

Xun Yu, a renowned strategist, has come to you to offer you his service. Many lords have offered him to join their side, but he rejected all the offers and decided to be a part of your ambition. You were thrilled to accept that someone so talented had come to you.
Yan Baihu can recruit generic [[b]]Han units[[/b]] with Bandit Network.
zh-cn: 严白虎可通过匪盗网招募普通[[b]]汉兵种部队[[/b]]。
zh-tw: 嚴白虎可通過盜賊人脈招募普通 [[b]]漢軍單位[[/b]]。

eng: Years of fighting have solidified the faith these soldiers have in each other.
zh-cn: 军团的成员皆长年共处的伙伴，对彼此充满了信念。
zh-tw: 軍團的成員皆長年共處的夥伴，對彼此充滿了信念。

eng: Years of fighting the steppe tribes have shaped these Xiliang spear-riders into a deadly force.
zh-cn: 草原部落多年的战斗已将这些西凉骑兵塑造成了一支致命的力量。
zh-tw: 草原部落多年的戰鬥已將這些西涼騎兵塑造成了一支致命的力量。

eng: You agree with your men and prepare to descend.
zh-cn: 你同意下人的意见，准备下山。
zh-tw: 你同意下人的意見，準備下山。

eng: You allow them to join your cause.

You are furious because you found out your old friend and trusted servant, Xun Yu, has turned his back against you. He does not oppose you publicly for the time being, but you are certain he will betray you the first chance he gets. \\n\\n It's time to choose. You can send him a "gift." when he receives your "gift," he who shares a deep friendship with you will know the meaning of it...
You are rather taken with a fine steed.
zh-cn: 您被一匹好马吸引住了。
zh-tw: 您被一匹好馬吸引住了。

eng: You are rather taken with a peculiar sword.
zh-cn: 您被一柄怪剑吸引住了。
zh-tw: 您被一柄怪劍吸引住了。

eng: You decide not to avail yourself of their wares.
zh-cn: 你决定不买他们的货品。
zh-tw: 你決定不買他們的貨品。

eng: You do not have the prerequisite: %S.
You give up the hunt and return. However, for reasons unknown, the monster attacks stopped.
zh-cn: 您放弃了狩猎，回去了。然而不知为何，怪兽从此不再攻击。
zh-tw: 您放棄了狩獵，回去了。然而不知爲何，怪獸從此不再攻擊。

eng: You have acquired a tally that grants its bearer the authority to command Danyang troops.
zh-cn: 您获得一张可指挥丹阳部队的兵符。
zh-tw: 您獲得一張可指揮丹陽部隊的兵符。

eng: You have acquired a tally that grants its bearer the authority to command Jingchu troops.
zh-cn: 您获得一张可指挥荆楚部队的兵符。
zh-tw: 您獲得一張可指揮荊楚部隊的兵符。

eng: You hire a Sogdian mercenary group.
zh-cn: 您雇佣了一队粟特佣兵。
zh-tw: 您雇傭了一隊粟特傭兵。

eng: You refused to hand over Wang Yun and his family to them. Then the rebels are furious, and they're going through the whole country!
You rule your domain with military efficiency.
zh-cn: 以军队的效率治理领地。
zh-tw: 以軍隊的效率治理領地。

eng: Your attendant will assemble volunteers for military service.
zh-cn: 您的随从将去募集兵员。
zh-tw: 您的隨從將去募集兵員。

eng: Your attendant will help to expand the settlement.
zh-cn: 您的随从将协助扩张此城镇。
zh-tw: 您的隨從將協助擴張此城鎮。

eng: Your attendant will manage court affairs, streamlining bureaucracy.
zh-cn: 您的随从将管理宫廷事务，精简政务。
zh-tw: 您的隨從將管理宮廷事務，精簡政務。

eng: Your attendant will seek recruits for the local garrison.
zh-cn: 您的随从将为此地驻军寻找新兵。
zh-tw: 您的隨從將爲此地駐軍尋找新兵。

eng: Your attendant will sell the horses you've bred, for a fine sum.
zh-cn: 您的随从会将您所养的马匹以高价卖出。
zh-tw: 您的隨從會將您所養的馬匹以高價賣出。

eng: Your attendant will support your army in enemy territory.
zh-cn: 您的随从将在敌方领土支持您的军队。
zh-tw: 您的隨從將在敵方領土支援您的軍隊。

eng: Your messengers report a remarkable story. A trader spotted a Han woman living amongst the Xiongnu and identified her as Cai Yan, the daughter of the grand scholar Cai Yong. It seems she was forced to marry a chieftain of the Xiongnu. Perhaps someone could convince this chieftain to free Cai Yan. One of your scouts has already left to investigate...
Yuan Shu's army follows your faction.

Zheng Jiang has selected her most ferocious bandits to act as her ‘Fists of the Bandit Queen’; their role is to act as shock-troops, sneaking behind enemy lines to terrify foes with surprise attacks early in the battle. \\n\\n Each carries a heavy fu axe in each hand, and the wounds dealt by them can be catastrophic. Striking terror requires these troops to be without fear themselves, but also means they can tend to be undisciplined and difficult to control once their blood is hot with battle
Zhuge Liang has brilliantly engineered a new weapon. It is a crossbow that fires several bolts simultaneously to overwhelm the enemy.
zh-cn: 诸葛亮精心设计出一种新武器。这是一种能够同时射出多枚箭矢的弩弓，可以压制敌人。
zh-tw: 諸葛亮精心設計出一種新武器。這是一種能夠同時射出多枚箭矢的弩弓，可以壓制敵人。

eng: [[b]]ARMOUR[[/b]]\\n\\n Decreases standard melee, ranged and explosion damages. Doesn't help against armour-piercing damage.
zh-cn: [[b]]护甲[[/b]]\\n\\n减少部队受到的标准近战伤害、远程伤害以及爆炸伤害。无法防御穿甲伤害。
zh-tw: [[b]]護甲[[/b]]\\n\\n 減少單位受到的標準近戰傷害、遠程傷害以及爆炸傷害。無法防禦穿甲傷害。

eng: [[b]]BONUS VS. CAVALRY[[/b]]\\n\\n Increases melee damage against cavalry.
zh-cn: [[b]]对抗骑兵加成[[/b]]\\n\\n提高对骑兵的近战伤害。
zh-tw: [[b]]對抗騎兵加成[[/b]]\\n\\n 提高對騎兵的近戰傷害。

eng: [[b]]BONUS VS. INFANTRY[[/b]]\\n\\n Increases melee damage against infantry.
zh-cn: [[b]]对抗步兵加成[[/b]]\\n\\n提高对步兵的近战伤害。
zh-tw: [[b]]對抗步兵加成[[/b]]\\n\\n 提高對步兵的近戰傷害。

eng: [[b]]CHARGE RESISTANCE[[/b]]\\n\\n Determines how solidly this unit can withstand enemy charges. Only functions when the unit is braced.
zh-cn: [[b]]冲锋抵抗力[[/b]]\\n\\n决定该部队能承受多大程度的敌军冲锋。此作用于该部队被冲锋时。
